messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Vancouver Island
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Sharon. I am in Prince George, not on the Island, but there is a yahoo group called BCUnschoolers that I belong to , you might be able to hook up with
messages.messageBody:
Hi Sharon. I am in Prince George, not on the Island, but there is a yahoo
group called BCUnschoolers that I belong to , you might be able to hook up with
someone near you, as there are a bunch on Vancouver Island. AS far as
provincial regs, the BC government site has a the regs posted under I believe Ministry
of Education.
Good Luck

Nancy in BC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Vancouver Island
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, are there any unschoolers here from my area?  I just moved and need to know what the provincial laws are here. Thanks, Sharon
messages.messageBody:
Hello, are there any unschoolers here from my area? I just moved and
need to know what the provincial laws are here.


Thanks,

Sharon
